attributes.action: resign & call a general election on 4th May 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the Governments humiliation at the polls on May 3rd. We demand that the Prime Minister resign & call a General election as they have clearly lost the confidence of the British people & have no "moral" duty to continue in Goverment.

rejection.details: The local elections haven't taken place yet...
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
